entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the protagonist who is trying to reach his goal. He is aware that he needs to answer a riddle correctly in order to pass.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as someone who is good at solving riddles, but she is not present in this scene.

entities.name: sphinx
entities.description: The sphinx is a creature that poses the riddle to Harry. It has the ability to attack if Harry answers incorrectly.

relationships.description: Harry is challenged by the sphinx to answer a riddle correctly in order to pass.
Harry compares himself unfavorably to Hermione, who he thinks would be better at solving the riddle.
